properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 10:52AM EST until January 20 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Lake Effect Snow Expected...

.A cold front ushered in a seasonably cold air mass to the local
area overnight. The lake effect snow is expected to occur today
near the lakeshore and the the flow will become more northwest
tonight causing multiple bands of snow to develop across the
snowbelt.

* WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35
mph.

* WHERE...Cuyahoga county.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST MONDAY
